exceptions.exn: No such bound variable net (possible names are: P, net0, net', failed, failed' and out).

original: intros net H. pose proof (simulation_1 net H). apply no_append_entries_to_self_invariant in H0. apply ghost_invariant_lower with (net := net). intros net' net'' failed failed' out Hstep Hinv. apply H0. unfold deghost. unfold no_append_entries_to_self in *. intros p t n pli plt es ci Hin Hbody Hdst. specialize (H0 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Hin Hbody Hdst). contradiction.
